remarks: Each entry (according to Wikipedia "Matrix (mathematics)", 30-Dec-2018, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_(mathematics)#Definition (or element or component or coefficient or cell) of a matrix is an element of the underlying ring.  (Contributed by AV, 16-Dec-2018.)
statement:
matecl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
matecl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
matecl $p |- ( ( I e. N /\ J e. N /\ M e. ( Base ` A ) ) -> ( I M J ) e. K ) $.
